discussiontools-autotopicsubpopup-body: Ibenya nkaabɔ sɛ obi dze mbuae fofor to nkɔmbɔdzi yi mu a. Ibotum so asesa wo nkaabɔ mu hyehyɛɛ mbrɛ epɛ no
discussiontools-emptystate-desc: [[{{MediaWiki:discussiontools-emptystate-link-talkpages}}|Nkitahodzi bea]] yɛ beebi a nkorɔfo dzi nkitaho fa kwan a wobotum ama ndzemba a ɔwɔ {{SITENAME}} no edzi mu.  Ibotum so afa dɛm kwan yi do na ɛdza ahyɛase nye nkorɔfo atwetwen nkɔmbɔ wo kwan a obetu mpon [[:{{SUBJECTPAGENAME}}]].
discussiontools-emptystate-desc-self: Nkorɔfo a wɔwɔ {{SITENAME}} botum dze dɛm [[{{MediaWiki:discussiontools-emptystate-link-userpage}}|nkɔmbɔ bea]] dzea to amanson kaseɛbɔ dze ama wo na ibenya nkaabɔ dɛ wayɛ a.
discussiontools-emptystate-desc-self-ano:
Nkorɔfo a wɔwɔ ha {{SITENAME}} botum dze dɛm [[{{MediaWiki:discussiontools-emptystate-link-userpage-anon}}|nkɔmbɔdzi bea]] dzea ama  amanson kaseabɔ a ɔkyerɛ nsansa a  ɔwɔ IP akyerɛkwan a idze dzi dwuma.

Dodow IP akyerɛkwan sesa aber biara, na mber pii nyimpa dodow noara dze kyɛ nkorɔfo. Ibotum so [$1 ebue account] anna [$2 akɔ mu] ama ɔnfa daakye basabasa yɛ mmba wo nye nkorɔfo a wopue dɛwdɛw no. Ibue account a sie wo IP akyerɛkwan.
discussiontools-emptystate-desc-user: [[{{MediaWiki:discussiontools-emptystate-link-userpage}}|kasa bea]] yɛ beebi a nkorɔfo kyerɛ hɔn adwen wɔ kwan a wobetum ayɛ bea a {{SITENAME}} ɔyɛ papa. Hyɛ adwenkyerɛ fofor ase a ɔboa na ɔdze nkabomudze {{GENDER:{{PAGENAME}}|with}} [[:{{SUBJECTPAGENAME}}|{{PAGENAME}}]]. adzea ibɛka wɔha bɛkɔ akɔda amanson ama na nkorɔfo ehu.
discussiontools-emptystate-title: Hyɛ nkɔmbɔtwetwe a ɔfa {{SUBJECTPAGENAME}} ho ase
discussiontools-error-comment-disappeare: Meserɛ wo, san bue kratafa no bio
discussiontools-postedit-confirmation-to: Wɔdze wo tsirasɛm no aka ho
discussiontools-target-comment-missing: Dɛm nkasaho yi nnyi hɔ. Obotum aba dɛ wɔapepa anaa woeyi efi hɔ.
discussiontools-target-comments-missing: Nkasaho fofor biara nnyi hɔ. Obotum aba dɛ wɔapepa anaa woeyi efi hɔ.
